entry.string: Keywords is a Xaraya Utility Module.
entry.translation: Keyvurds is a Xereya Uteelity Mudoole-a.

entry.string: that allows you to assign keywords to module items (taxonomy) and to look up items by keyword. Enable its hooks for any module where you want to use it...
entry.translation: thet elloos yuoo tu esseegn keyvurds tu mudoole-a items (texunumy) und tu luuk up items by keyvurd. Bork bork bork! Ineble-a its huuks fur uny mudoole-a vhere-a yuoo vunt tu use-a it...

entry.string: After enabling the keywords hooks for a particular module, you'll see an input box where you can fill in relevant keywords whenever you create or modify a module item. Afterwards, when viewing an item, you can retrieve a list of other items having the same keyword(s).
entry.translation: Effter inebleeng zee keyvurds huuks fur a perteecooler mudoole-a, yuoo'll see-a un inpoot bux vhere-a yuoo cun feell in relefunt keyvurds vhenefer yuoo creete-a oor mudeeffy a mudoole-a item. Effterverds, vhee feeooing un item, yuoo cun retreeefe-a a leest ooff oozeer items hefeeng zee seme-a keyvurd(s).

entry.string:
This module, now, may also restrict keywords to a predefined set of words, tipical for each hooked module.

In the future thi module may try to extract keywords automatically from other fields on create/update. Contributions in that or other directions are welcome :-)
entry.translation:
Thees mudoole-a, noo, mey elsu restreect keyvurds tu a predeffeened set ooff vurds, teepicel fur iech huuked mudoole-a.

In zee footoore-a thee mudoole-a mey try tu ixtrect keyvurds ootumeteecelly frum oozeer feeelds oon creete-a/updete-a. Cuntreebooshuns in thet oor oozeer durecshuns ere-a velcume-a :-)

entry.string: There are no included blocks at this time
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks et thees teeme

entry.string: new/create/modify/update/delete -- Allows you to create/update keywords
entry.translation: noo/creete-a/mudeeffy/updete-a/delete-a -- Elloos yuoo tu creete-a/updete-a keyvurds

entry.string: display/search -- Allows you to display/search keywords
entry.translation: deespley/seerch -- Elloos yuoo tu deespley/seerch keyvurds
